鷔鷔鷔

鷔字的基本解释

鷔
áo
古代传说中的一种不吉祥的鸟，形状像大雁，红嘴，羽毛白色，据说这种鸟聚集在一起时就预示着国家要灭亡。

鷔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［áo］
［《廣韻》五勞切，平豪，疑。］
亦作“1”。
传说中的凶鸟名。又称黄鷔。
[②]［ào］
［《廣韻》五到切，去号，疑。］
用同“傲”。

鷔字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷔； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1498第42
【廣韻】五勞切【集韻】牛刀切，?音敖。【廣韻】不祥鳥，白首赤口。【郭璞·江賦】則有晨鵠，天雞，鴢鷔，鷗?。又【山海經】?丹山有五色之鳥，人面有髮，爰有靑鴍黃鷔。又【廣韻】五到切【集韻】魚到切，?音傲。【廣韻】鷔，鳦魚鳥狀也。又【集韻】倪虬切，音汼。義同。

鷔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷔字的起名意思

古代传说中的一种不吉祥的鸟。

鷔
Basic explanation of words
鷔
áo
An unlucky bird in ancient legends, shaped like a wild goose, with a red beak and white feathers. It is said that when this bird gathers, it heralds the country's demise.
鷔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [áo]
["Guangyun" Five hard work, Pinghao, doubt. ]
Also known as "1".
The legendary name of the fierce bird. Also known as huang pi.
[②]［ào］
["Guangyun" Five to cut, go to the number, doubt. ]
Use the same "proud".
鷔
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷔; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1498 Page 42
[Guang Yun] Five labor cuts [Ji Yun] cut with a great knife,? Yinao. [Guang Yun] Ominous bird, white head with bare mouth. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] On the other hand, there are Chenhu, Tianji, Yin, and Gull. Also [Shanhaijing]? Danshan has five-color birds, human faces have hair, and 靑鴍鷔鷔. [Guang Yun] Five to cut [Ji Yun] Fish to cut,? Yin proud. [Guangyun] The shape of a fish and a bird. Also 【Jiyun】Ni Qiuqie, Yinxian. The same meaning.
鷔
